availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oscar McKenzie (Morgan County, Kentucky, county judge)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, county judge. Morgan County native. Married to Eliza A. Lewis McKenzie on February 17, 1859. Father of Elizabeth McKenzie, Daniel McKenzie, and Frances McKenzie. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860. Presiding judge of the Morgan County Court in Morgan County in 1865.

ab.bibl: KYR-0001-005-0052. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District No. 1, p. 4. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, West Liberty, Precinct No. 1, p. 27. W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle, and G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State, 8th ed. (Louisville and Chicago: F. A. Battey and Company, 1888), 907.
